data.title: Thomas M. Disch
data.meta_description: Thomas Michael Disch (February 2, 1940 - July 4, 2008) was an American science fiction author who wrote the episode "Missing Hours" of the series Miami Vice. Disch wrote several science fiction novels, including The Genocides, Echo Round His Bones, Camp Concentration, and several others, as well...
data.text:
Miami Vice Writer

Born

February 2, 1940, Des Moines, Iowa

Died

July 4, 2008, New York City, New York (age 68, suicide)

Active (author)

1962-2008

Thomas Michael Disch (February 2, 1940 - July 4, 2008) was an American science fiction author who wrote the episode "Missing Hours" of the series Miami Vice.

Career[]
